title: Create password screen - cannot see tips while typing a password on iOS
body:
# Bug Report


## Problem 

If the `Type password` field is focused, the tips (`Lower case`, `Upper-case`, `Numbers`, `Symbols`) are hidden behind the keyboard on iOS devices, so `Return`  must be pressed to see again the tips.

https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/67952253/227577278-74912850-422f-4658-955c-5a8b74112509.MP4

#### Expected behavior
the `Tips` component stays above the keyboard when it is open, according to [designs](https://www.figma.com/file/o4qG1bnFyuyFOvHQVGgeFY/Onboarding-for-Mobile?node-id=2241-251868&t=LVrK5l6OdrYZKIix-4)

#### Actual behavior

Tips are hidden behind the keyboard on iOS devices


### Reproduction

1. Open Status as a completely new user
2. Navigate to I'm new to Status -> Generate Keys -> Set a username & color -> Create password screen
3. Focus the password field 

### Additional Information

- Operating System: iOS


## Additional notes

Probably this problem can be solved by using the `keyboardAvoidingView` component, but must be considered that this UI is using a `ScrollView` in order to look good in devices with a small screen.
